weka.server
Class WekaTaskMap.NamedClassDelegator

java.lang.Object
  weka.server.WekaTaskMap.NamedClassDelegator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, LogHandler, Task, NamedTask
Enclosing class:
WekaTaskMap
public static class WekaTaskMap.NamedClassDelegator
extends java.lang.Object
implements NamedTask, LogHandler

Wrapper NamedTask that delegates to the task it wraps around. Useful for converting scheduled tasks into unscheduled tasks. A scheduled task is registered with the server it is first transmitted to and this server has the responsibility of enforcing the schedule. If it hands off a task to a slave then the version sent to the slave is a one-off unscheduled copy of the original task.

Author:
Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
See Also:
